title: Kryptoyaner
author: Kryptoyaner
created_time: August 29, 2023, 03:22:06 PMLast edit: August 29, 2023, 03:34:27 PM by Kryptoyaner
content: Hello Guys Here i want to present the new crypto project New Masternode Savings Coin (nMNSC)The story behind the project:We were an investor in a crypto project called Masternode Savings Coin (MNSC). We really liked the developer's concept at the time because it was in line with what we were doing. So we put a few thousand euros into our hands and actively supported the project through a strategic partnership. Unfortunately, this support remained quite one-sided, because there wasn't much from the developer side, instead of concentrating on this one project, he took over a few others and then worked on them, then a little on the other, etc. That's how it happened, of course there has of course been zero development over the last few months while we have risen to become the biggest whale because we have bought a lot of coins from the market. Then he collected money from other investors with the promise to pay them back with interest, but he hasn't been around since mid-June. the users who lent him the money are now chasing their money and we are sitting with many others (also from the other projects) on worthless coins. So a few from the community, including us, got together to save our funds and give the others the opportunity to do the same. For this reason, we ended the partnership and are now redesigning the whole thing according to the original ideas that we as a company had with it. MNSC now becomes nMNSC (New Masternode Savings Coin).What is the Usecase of nMNSC?The main Usecase of nMNSC is to build an Buybackprogram through investments in other PoS Projects. It will be a closed Cycle and can expanded any time. The Rewards from nMNSC will change in BTC -> These BTC will be used to buy Coins from other PoS Projects -> These will generate new Rewards -> These Reward will change in BTC -> These BTC will use to buyback nMNSC from Market = Cycle closed. This will be the Basic. Also the community can create any time more usecases and also the users can create there own usecases. The target is to create a  new store of value backed by other PoS Projects.No OwnerWe decided to have no Owner. A Crypto Project stay and fall with the Community. So we decided to give the Force to the Community like a DAO. Everyone can make suggestions how we can grow up, then we discuss about it. If we see the reactions are positive we bring it to the final vote. Through a Votingsystem the Community can decide about it. The Team just manage the basics.https://cdn.discordapp.com/attachments/1130925058773229568/1145970804551585792/nMNSC-logo-256x256.pngExchange nMNSC will be listet on Stakecube Exchange in next days. https://stakecube.nethttps://cdn.discordapp.com/attachments/1142056334880165960/1142060274967388210/image-1.pngDiscordFor more information about this project and if you are interested, please visit our Discord server https://discord.gg/YXV3SW4XVrCoin Specs• PoW Algorithm: Quark• Premine: 35,000,000 nMNSC• PoW Blocks: 1 - 500• PoS Blocks: Starting from 501• Block Time: 60 Seconds• Maturity: 20 Confirmations• Prefix: nMNSC adresses start with the capital letter "N"• Ports: 14258 (p2p) / 14259 (rpc)Why is the Premine so high and what happen with it?The Premine of nMNSC will have 35,000,000 nMNSC. The reason of this is we take into account the amount of coins and their current values of other Derik Projects, also their are about 19 Million MNSC. So it can secure that any users of all other Derik Projects, can swap to nMNSC. Anything left after that, will burned.

comments.body: The Masternodes was important for stabilize the Chain, in the first 15000 Blocks, the Blockreward is 1, so we have no profit. Now all user can host Masternodes, there are 25 Masternodes hosted now and more will comes. We are listet now on Stakecube, Pecunia and CoinexplorerStakecube: https://stakecube.net - there you can trade, stake and hosting masternodesPecunia: https://pecuniaplatform.io/coin-stats/nmnsc - this is a monitoring and masternode hosting serviceCoinexplorer: https://www.coinexplorer.net/NMNSC - Another Monitoring serviceMasternode details and instructions also are online

Swaptime ends 29th. September 2023 03.59am (german time)4855128.07 MNSC 38039.00 MNBTC1575765.00 AUOP398712.00 ALLT20000.00 Piggie, 0.00 CATS- There are now 77 masternodes online and there are 5,800,000 nMNSC in circulation. - Masternodes are made in the following countries: United States,Germany,Norway,Canada,Saudi Arabia,Czechia,Russia. - We are partnering with Frecoapp, Freco App is  a  Decentralized, Non custodial, Multi Chain Mobile App.  Download Freco App on Playstore.https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.frecotoken.freco-  We would also like to support Frecoo Coin as the first masternode coin by purchasing coins and setting up masternodes.https://cdn.discordapp.com/attachments/1127483154442240044/1155909502168735806/img_001.jpg

comments.author: Kryptoyaner
comments.body: Good Morning together The first investmentcycle comes to the end. We accumulate in this cycle (without buyback) nMNSC worth of 0.01118637 BTC, or in average 0.00036650 BTC/day. The Kryptoyaner company holds now 3078234.25 nMNSC at average price of 1 Sat. When we reach the 4kk nMNSC, the next 500k goes to the basic buybackprogram, that we can start then when all 10 Masternodes are filled. From the budget of 0.01728000 BTC are 0.00609367 BTC (35,26%) left. This will be integrate into the next Investmentcycle. So we have in Investmentcycle II a budget of 0.02337363 that we will use for keep the price stable. The daily accumulation will growing up +35,26% from 0.00035000 BTC to 0.00047341 BTC/day. The price is stable at 4 Sats, this is a very good start, cause the minimum price of 1 sat is safe and now we have to try to hold this price or brings up with your support.From Sunday 15th. October 08.00am (german time) we starting the registration for usecase-1 which will start 1st. November.

comments.author: Kryptoyaner
comments.body: Howdy together Investmentcycle II comes to the end. We accumulate in this cycle (without buyback and OTC trading)) nMNSC worth of 0.02337363 BTC, or in average 0.00047341 BTC/day.  Additional we sold OTC 250612 nMNSC for 6 Sats each to friends who want to hodl the coins min. 1 Year. The Kryptoyaner company holds now 3733251.37 nMNSC at average price of 2 Sat. When we reach the 4kk nMNSC, the next 500k goes to the basic buybackprogram, that we can start then when all 10 Masternodes are filled. From the budget of 0.02337363 BTC are 0.00000000 BTC (0,00%) left. In our analytics we see that the demand is almost zero. The user just sell there rewards, thats good for us, bad for them. Given the fact that our budget of 0.00047341 BTC/day is not enough to break the 6 Sat resistance line, we will growing up. In investmencycle III we will bring up the budget to 0.001 BTC/day, but before we push the price, we will stabilize the lower positions, so we doubling all buyorders to 100k nMNSC on each position (actual 50k) The price is stable at 6 Sats and the baseprice of 1 Sat is already safe.In November 15th we start usecase-1, also we start in this cycle the Basic Buybackprogram. We move forward, step by step A new Voting time for the community ^^The platform https://www.mymasternodes.host/ which offers to host nMNSC Masternodes for 0,55$/month, migrates to the platform https://www.pasivin.com/ - Pasivin have other requirements for hosting Masternodes, the fee is there 0,033$/day (0,99$/month) also they offers Masternode shares with 6% fee. Now is the question: Should we let the Masternode share option online or should we close this option?Be a part of community and come in our discord

comments.author: Kryptoyaner
comments.body: Howdy together Monthly Report December 2023The 4th. month after launch was so greatful. In first week we reached a new All Time High at 0,006672$ or 0.00000015 BTC. In second week we saw a little correction and price goes down to 0.00000011 BTC recovered and stabilized at 0.00000013. In third week, the Kryptoyaner company loan 500000 nMNSC to start the basic buybackprogram. In same time they start expanding their own Kryptoyaner Buybackprogram. We had 2 Votings in this time. First voting was about which cryptoproject we implement first in basic buybackprogram, this voting had won SCC from Stakecube platform. Second Voting was about how many rewards must be created minimum before we takeover the next project. this voting had won the amount of 0.00005 BTC. In third week Kryptoyaner Investmentcycle IV has startet to keep price stable and we reached the amount of over 150 Masternodes. Also we got listing on DogeCash App, that allows to stake your Coins or hosting Masternodes which you can pay in all Cryptos there are listed. In last week less as 1,5% of total supply are in market. 20 new Masternodes has been startet and Stakecube startet his Zomboid Mod gaming server where you can find vouchers of crypto coins, inclusive nMNSC.Details:Coinsupply: 12864000 nMNSC (+1643000)Price: 0.00000013 BTC (+30%)Masternodes: 173 (+48)Community: 176 reg. users (+20)Other Milestones:December 4th. 2023 - New ATH at 0,004178$ (+7,43%)December 6th. 2023 - New ATH at 0,006672$ (+59,69%)December 12th. 2023 - Basic buybackprogram startsDecember 17th. 2023 - 12 Million nMNSC outside of premine are now generatedDecember 19th. 2023 - Hashrate reached 300 GH/sDecember 19th. 2023 - Difficulty first time over 5000December 21st. 2023 - 150 Masternodes now onlineDecember 27th. 2023 - Monthly trading volume reached first time 0.2 BTCDecember 27th. 2023 - First Basic Buyback in nMNSC
